name: test_e2e_with_logs[008_SQLI_ADV_082]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_082` |
| **Name** | MySQL Comment Bypass with SELECT |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/*!SELECT*/user,password`
- **Encoded**: `%2F%2A%21SELECT%2A%2Fuser%2Cpassword`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~44000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:54:28.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ADV_082-1770818068986-v1ol3b pattern_id=SQLI_ADV_082 uri=/?q=%2F%2A%21SELECT%2A%2Fuser%2Cpassword client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ADV_082-1770818068986-v1ol3b pattern_id=SQLI_ADV_082 uri=/?q=%2F%2A%21SELECT%2A%2Fuser%2Cpassword client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
13:54:28.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ADV_082-1770818068986-v1ol3b pattern_id=SQLI_ADV_082 uri=/?q=%2F%2A%21SELECT%2A%2Fuser%2Cpassword client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
